FY1003 Exam Formulas.name: Maxwell's Equations (Integral Form)
FY1003 Exam Formulas.formula: \oint \mathbf{E}\cdot d\mathbf{A} = \frac{q}{\varepsilon_0}, \quad \oint \mathbf{B}\cdot d\mathbf{A} = 0, \quad \oint \mathbf{E}\cdot d\mathbf{l} = -\frac{d}{dt}\int \mathbf{B}\cdot d\mathbf{A}, \quad \oint \mathbf{B}\cdot d\mathbf{l} = \mu_0 I + \mu_0\varepsilon_0\frac{d}{dt}\int \mathbf{E}\cdot d\mathbf{A}
FY1003 Exam Formulas.description: E: electric field, B: magnetic field, q: charge, I: current, ε₀: permittivity of free space, μ₀: permeability of free space

FY1003 Exam Formulas.description: F: force, q: charge, E: electric field, v: velocity, B: magnetic field

FY1003 Exam Formulas.description: u: energy density, E: electric field, B: magnetic field, ε₀: permittivity, μ₀: permeability
